title: [MINDSET] Ep. 183 From Fear to Freedom w/Ashley LeMieux
description:

How does your life feel?

Â 

Ashley LeMieux, is an entrepreneur, author, and speaker here to share how to move from fear to freedom. Be sure to stick around for the entire episode, Ash shares a sneak-peak portion of Ashley LeMieuxâ€™s soon-to-release new book!

Â 

Healing doesnâ€™t mean you will go back to how things once were, you prepare for a new future. Ashley shares her vulnerable story about healing and moving forward. Her story is filled with advice on how to heal and step into a place of freedom.

Â 

Clarity mapping is a framework and tool that Ashley LeMieux shares that will help you move forward. Each day, start off by asking 5 simple questions that will help guide you in the right path. Listen in to hear these insightful yet simple Qâ€™s!

Â 

Whether you have lost someone from illness, are currently working through a challenging circumstance, or unfortunate loss, this episode is a beautiful message on how to move from fear into love.

Â 

In This Episode, Youâ€™ll Learn:

  1. The process of clarity mapping.
  2. How to reframe your thoughts during difficult times.
  3. Tools to step away from fear and into a place of love.
  4. Ways to get more in touch with your feelings and intuition.

Â
